entries.title: UK MP Asks Expert About Risks of AI and Is Told ‘It Could Kill Everyone’
entries.description: Ai-Da Robot, the world's first ultra-realistic humanoid robot artist, appears at a photo call in a committee room in the House of Lords in London on Oct. 11, 2022. (Rob Pinney/Getty Images)

entries.title: AI Adoption Needs to Be Done Responsibly, Says Student Creator of App That Detects Chatbot Generated Text
entries.description: Edward Tian, Princeton University student and GPTZero creator, on Jan.22, 2023. (William Huang/The Epoch Times)

entries.title: Parents Urged to Heed Child Online Safety Following 69 Percent Increase in Cyberbullying Complaints
entries.description: A student uses his mobile phone for research during a english lesson at the Ridings Federation Winterbourne International Academy in South Gloucestershire, England, on Feb. 26, 2015. (Matt Cardy/Getty Images)
